0.2.name: wordpress/add-tags-and-category-to-page
0.2.description:
This Plugin allows user to use tags and category in wordpress pages.

You can enable and disable tags and category support for pages under Settings > Add Tags And Category For Page.

Needs Activation Key from Version 0.2. Comes With 30 Days Trial Period. Offer your price ($0 to $100) and get the license key from here

Please report any bugs @ http://dineshkarki.com.np/plugins/add-tags-and-category-to-page/report-bugs.
